mapper.select: SELECT reg_date, upd_date FROM tbcm_map WHERE map_uid = #{map_uid} ORDER BY upd_date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT latitude1, longitude1, latitude2, longitude2, latitude3, longitude3, latitude4, longitude4 ,center_latitude, center_longitude, width, height FROM tbcm_map t1 WHERE map_uid = #{map_uid} LIMIT 1
